item.description:
Join Red Sox Natives and Boston Event Guide.com on Wednesday, April 7, 2009, at the Greatest Bar to watch the Boston Red Sox vs the New York Yankees.

Guests will watch the first night game, munch on complimentary appetizer buffet (from 6:30-8:00pm), and be entered to win prizes, including sports memorabilia, tickets to upcoming Red Sox games, Red Sox gear and more.

Cost is $10.00 in advance or $20.00 at the door if available.
Special offer 2 for $10.00 until March 26 - limited tickets available with offer only good until deadline and then the prices go up.

Natives must purchase tickets at bostoneventguide.com [url=www.bostoneventguide.com. ]

Look for the Red Sox Natives on the second floor balcony and lounge area.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Hostess at Door / On the Second Floor Balcony
item.name: Watch Red Sox vs New York Yankees at The Greatest Bar
